channel.title: Freeze header
channel.description:
one of my clients wants to be able to make the header stay static at the top of the page and not move with the rest of the page, I have been messing around with it for ages and cant get it to work. I dont really want to use a iframe as I skin the website in wordpress.
any help would be greatly appreciated.
the website address is http://www.young-guns.biz if you are interested.

item.title: Freeze header
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

um ye, so just use their code?

		#header {
			position: fixed;
			top: 0; 
			left: 0;
			z-index: 9999;
			background: #eee;
			width: 100%;
			margin: 0;
			padding: 5px;
		}
		/*--IE6 Hack - Fixed Positioning to the Top--*/
		*html #header { 
			position: absolute;
			top: expression(eval(document.compatMode &&document.compatMode=='CSS1Compat') ?documentElement.scrollTop : document.body.scrollTop);
		}
